game.description: Venture into the dangerous Blackwood Forest and retrieve the ancient amulet hidden deep within.
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient amulet from Blackwood Forest.

tasks.description: Travel to the edge of Blackwood Forest.
Navigate through the Blackwood Forest to the location of the ancient amulet.
Return the ancient amulet to the Mysterious Old Man.
tasks.objective: Return to the Mysterious Old Man.

game.title: The Lost Amulet of Blackwood Forest
